vulnerability.title: Enable Certmap in SSSD
vulnerability.description: SSSD should be configured to verify the certificate of the user or group. To set this up ensure that section like certmap/testing.test/rule_name is setup in /etc/sssd/sssd.conf. For example [certmap/testing.test/rule_name] matchrule =<SAN>.*EDIPI@mil maprule = (userCertificate;binary={cert!bin}) domains = testing.test
vulnerability.recommendation: Review and remediate: Enable Certmap in SSSD
